benchmark_details.name: TEXTQUESTS
benchmark_details.overview: TEXTQUESTS is a benchmark based on the Infocom suite of interactive fiction games, designed to assess an LLM agentâ€™s capacity for self-contained problem-solving through long-context reasoning in exploratory environments.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable a more accurate assessment of AI agents in challenging exploratory environments that require sustained, self-directed reasoning.

data.annotation: Using built-in game annotations and external InvisiClues hint booklets for context.

methodology.calculation: Game Progress is calculated based on labeled checkpoints for essential puzzles across the games.
methodology.interpretation: Models are compared based on their ability to complete games and manage in-game actions without external help.
methodology.validation: Formalized through comparative analysis with previous game progress metrics.

harm: Measuring harmful actions based on ethical implications in gameplay.
